questions.question_text:
You are onsite, working on a customer's factory floor. You need to return tomorrow and replace a belt on the conveyor. You look at the inventory in Warehouse 1, and there are 10 in stock. You pull the belt from stock and create an inventory transfer record.
What are the two correct steps to complete the transfer? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
Im fine with A. But not with B, there is no button "transfer" You just need to add the products and the quantity and click "save"

Selected Answer: AB
AB as per link
Answer provided is correct, A and B
https://community.dynamics.com/crm/b/crm365blog/posts/managing-inventory-in-field-service
IMPORTANT!!! I have already taken the exam and this question is included.

choices.D: Select the From warehouse location, then select the To warehouse location.
choices.C: Enter the part number from the drop down, then click to transfer.
choices.B: Enter the quantity to transfer, then click transfer.
choices.A: Select the source warehouse, then select the destination warehouse.
